attributes.action: Ages 20-30 mandatory combat readiness. 2 Hours per week training proactivity.
attributes.additional_details: After academic education, it's important to maintain mental resilience with a weekly routine to build confidence through combat activity in young people.
attributes.background: Form a readiness institution to support weekly routined combat activity in young people aged 20-30, developing self-defence and mental resilience.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure if you want the Government to reintroduce national service, or fund support for some other scheme.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
